args: La la laaa! I'm baaaaack!\nLet the beautification begin!
It is time to make everyone more\nbeautiful—including myself!
Excuse me, sir... Are you the miracle man?
Ha ha, I suppose my beauty IS miraculous!
Finally... I've heard so much about you.
It's him, dear!\nWe've found the miracle man!
Ah, wonderful.\nWe have a favor to ask, young man.
You wish to be beautified, I take it?\nCertainly!
Er...no. Could you defeat the fiend\nthat's living near our home?\nIt's quite unruly.
Pardon me—did you say a fiend?
Hm. Very well! It wouldn't be beautiful\nto turn away two people in need.\nLead the way!
Ugh! Strong AND repulsive!\nAnd just look at my poor fringe...
Forget yer mirror! This fiend's\nnot pullin' any punches!
Blast! Hold on, we'll be right—aaaugh!
Its attacks are splitting the ground!\nIs everyone okay?!
I-I think so... Wait, look at Zardin!
Oh no, he's on the other side of the\nfissure—and so is the fiend!
Cower in the face of my beauty, foul beast!\nHah!
What?! It didn't faint?! Hmph. It seems I'll\nhave to take a more traditional approach.
...Wait, where has my weapon gone?\nGoodness, I might be in a spot of trouble...
And with my weapon lost, and my allies\nout of reach...this is quite the pickle.
Have I finally discovered the limits of\nmy potential?
Though I sealed it away many moons ago,\nI continued to refine it in secret...
It's time for the Ultra Zardin\nDouble-Strength Deluxe!
Will I fall before this brute, or will\nmy beauty win the day? Let's find out!
Could it be...? Are we witnessing\nthe Goddess's glorious descent?
This is no miracle... It's Zardin!
My beauty is supreme! Enduring! Eternal!\nMay all the radiance I have sown as a\nbeautician come together in this moment!
What was that light, Zardin?\nDid the Goddess grant you a miracle?
Nay, 'twas the work of man—the product\nof all my experience as a beautician.
After applying my finest cosmetic creation,\nmy beauty surpassed known limits and my\nface began to radiate light.
You mean like the sun or somethin'?
I suppose a heavenly body is an apt\ncomparison to my luminescence—\nthough I am still more beautiful.
Huh. Well, I give up. Glad yer okay and all,\nbut yer not makin' a lick'a sense.
Such a beautiful light...\nHe really IS a man of miracles!
Yes, that nasty fiend didn't stand a chance.
Ha ha! As you just witnessed, there is\nnothing my beauty cannot achieve!
Come to me again, should you ever find\nyourselves in need.
I've actually produced a cosmetic even\nmore potent than what I used today.
Shall I show you? It is TRULY spectacular.
Oh? Come now, it's DAZZLING!\nAllow me to demonstrate...
Zardin's body was engulfed in a brilliant light—\nand stayed that way for the next three days.
He had beautified himself, his comrades,\nand ultimately the entire Halidom.\nTruly, his beauty was unrivaled.
